snippet: Senior officials and leading public figures portrayed the talks as an effort to end the six-month political crisis, but the provisional Ukrainian government offered little compromise.
abstract: Senior Ukrainian officials and leading public figures open talks that they portray as an effort to end the country’s six-month-old political crisis, but provisional Ukrainian government offers little compromise and there is no one present directly representing pro-Russian separatists in eastern Ukraine.
lead_paragraph: Senior officials and leading public figures portrayed the talks as an effort to end the six-month political crisis, but the provisional Ukrainian government offered little compromise.

headline.main: Talks on Ukraine Crisis Open in Kiev Without Representation for Separatists
headline.print_headline: Talks on Ukraine Crisis Open in Kiev Without Representation for Separatists
